__TOC__

The Summer Youth Workshops are designed to 
* give youth the tools to comfortably use the Ubuntu operating system for all of their computing needs
* demonstrate the significant advantages to using Free and Open Source Software
* enable interested youth to pursue learning the basics of computing
* teach values of civic engagement and community development
